name: Romance
description: A genre that focuses on love stories and romantic relationships.

name: Fiction
description: A genre that includes imaginative or invented stories, typically not based on real events.

name: Horror
description: A genre designed to frighten, scare, or shock readers with themes of suspense, terror, and the supernatural.

name: Tragedy
description: A genre that explores themes of sorrow, loss, and human suffering, often with a somber or emotional tone.

name: Mystery
description: A genre centered around solving crimes, uncovering secrets, and unraveling puzzles.
